attributes.action: Provide British citizenship for all Hong Kong citizens regardless of BNO status
attributes.additional_details:
The government should offer to give all Hong Kong citizens British citizenship regardless of BNO status. Since Britain made a deal that democracy would be upheld in Hong Kong which is now being dishonoured by China, it is our freedom of democracy that is being threatened and thus it is a British moral responsibility to protect and welcome all Hong Kong citizens regardless of BNO status.
Everybody is entitled to a free democracy
attributes.background: Since Hong kong was a British democratic overseas territory that China is now threatening. Britain has a moral responsibility to provide refuge for democratic asylum seekers regardless of BNO status.
